import React, {Fragment,useEffect,useState} from 'react' const QuizOver = React.forwardRef((props, ref) => { const [asked, setasked] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { setasked(ref.current) }, [ref]) const questionAnswerd = asked.map((options)=>{ return( {options.question } {options.answer } ) }) return (

Bravo vous etes un vrais fans!!

Reussite : 10%
Note : 10/10

les reponses aux questions posées :

{questionAnswerd}
Questions Réponses Infos
) }) export default React.memo(QuizOver)
